$SNMPTRAPCMD VIPTELA-TRAPS::viptelaPolicySlaViolationPktDrop VIPTELA-TRAPS::eventTime s EXAMPLEE VIPTELA-TRAPS::netconfNotificationSeverity i 1 VIPTELA-TRAPS::viptelaPolicyVpnId u 9999 VIPTELA-TRAPS::viptelaPolicyApplication s EXAMPLE VIPTELA-TRAPS::viptelaPolicySourceIp s EXAMPLE VIPTELA-TRAPS::viptelaPolicySourcePort u 9999 VIPTELA-TRAPS::viptelaPolicyDestinationIp s EXAMPLE VIPTELA-TRAPS::viptelaPolicyDestinationPort u 9999 VIPTELA-TRAPS::viptelaPolicyProtocol u 9999 VIPTELA-TRAPS::viptelaPolicyDscp u 9999 VIPTELA-TRAPS::viptelaPolicySlaInformation s EXAMPLE VIPTELA-TRAPS::viptelaPolicySlaStatus s EXAMPLE

event.Summary: VPN interface PCS fault is detected

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD VIPTELA-TRAPS::viptelaVpnInterfacePcsFaultDetected VIPTELA-TRAPS::eventTime s EXAMPLEE VIPTELA-TRAPS::netconfNotificationSeverity i 1 VIPTELA-TRAPS::viptelaVpnVpnId u 9999 VIPTELA-TRAPS::viptelaVpnIfName s EXAMPLE VIPTELA-TRAPS::viptelaVpnNewState i 0
